metadata.title: CVE-2020-27741 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Citadel WebCitthrough 926 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia multiple pages and parameters. NOTE: this was reported to the vendor ina publicly archived "Multiple Security Vulnerabilities in WebCit 926"thread.

criterions.comment: webcit package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
